knxUltimateHueAreaMotion.heading: Hue Motion Area node
knxUltimateHueAreaMotion.output_info: No KNX gateway selected. When the Node-RED output pin is enabled, MotionAware area motion events are still emitted to your flow.
knxUltimateHueAreaMotion.motion_info: Link your KNX group address to receive the aggregated motion state for this MotionAware area.
